descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Trae Young grabs a defensive rebound and takes it all the way for a layup on the other end.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae Young scores with coast-to-coast bucket) 2022/01/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae Young scores with coast-to-coast bucket

videos.description: Trae Young gets his floater to fall despite being fouled by P.J. Tucker.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae Young absorbs contact for and-1 score) 2022/01/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae Young absorbs contact for and-1 score

videos.description: Onyeka Okongwu denies P.J. Tucker with a block off the glass.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Okongwu rises for big block on Tucker) 2022/01/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Okongwu rises for big block on Tucker

videos.description: The referees don't blow their whistles as Duncan Robinson appears to travel, but the Hawks steal the ball and get a transition layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ball don't lie: Hawks quickly score after Robinson's travel goes uncalled) 2022/01/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ball don't lie: Hawks quickly score after Robinson's travel goes uncalled
